name: Amplify
about: An open-source platform to simplify getting support for advocacy groups for their missions by getting the word out.

details.Author: Param Siddharth, Glenn Piludu, Mariah Morales, Manisha Priyadarshini, Jonathan Wallace, Jacob Walraff
details.Technologies: Vue, ExpressJS, Knex, Lob API, Cicero API
